mapper.insert: insert into fooddb (foodname, kcal, carbohydrate, protein, fat, sugar, sodium) VALUES (#{foodName}, #{kcal}, #{carbohydrate}, #{protein}, #{fat}, #{sugar}, #{sodium})
mapper.select: select * from fooddb order by protein desc limit 10
select * from fooddb order by sugar asc limit 10
select * from fooddb order by sodium asc limit 10
select * from fooddb order by rand() limit 100
